none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 05, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 This was the first one. There was another one that came after this one, but this one was the first one. Snarling, honest, urgent, in your face hardcore punk....that's what this one is. That's what the other one is too, but that's what this one was first. "Frustration" is the sound of kids burning shit in a parking lot. "I'm Important" is the sound of crying while smashing the face of the people who jumped you last week. DYE is the sound of mid-teens North American punk, and it sounds even better now than it did then. DYE
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2016/06/dye.html

seo.title: - Dye demo 2013 - Terminal Escape
